def knight_or_knave(said):
    return "Knight!" if eval(str(said)) else "Knave! Do not trust."
knight_or_knave = lambda said: 'Knight!' if eval(str(said)) else 'Knave! Do not trust.'

def knight_or_knave(said):
    return eval(str(said)) and "Knight!" or 'Knave! Do not trust.'

def knight_or_knave(said):
    f,t="Knave! Do not trust.","Knight!"
    if isinstance(said,bool):return [f,t][said]
    elif isinstance(said,str):return [f,t][eval(said)]
knight_or_knave = lambda said: ('Knave! Do not trust.', 'Knight!')[eval(said) if isinstance(said, str) else said]

def knight_or_knave(said):
    return 'Knight!' if bool(eval(str(said))) else 'Knave! Do not trust.'
